strIntroduction: The most special tour- A day-trip to South and North Korea's border! You can feel the military atmosphere after Korean War as if you were a soldier then in this tour. Constructed by North Korea as a military incursions toward South Korea, The Third Tunnel was sealed right after discovered, and it's now open to visitors.
strTitle: A day-trip to Panmunjom and The Third Tunnel

strIntroduction: Leave the busy city of Seoul behind on a one-day excursion to Mt Seorak (Seoraksan), South Korea’s third-highest mountain. As you explore with your fun and knowledgeable guide, see why this UNESCO-protected mountain is one of the country’s most popular destinations, named for its slowly melting covering of snow. Your one-day tour also visits tranquil temples and a thriving fish market, taking you behind the scenes to glimpse daily life in South Korea.
strTitle: Mt. Seorak 1 Day Tour

Finish your class in the best way possible — sit down and savor your creations.

strIntroduction: How can you travel abroad without internet? There's no need to fill in forms for rental! With this 7-day 3GB SIM card, you can not only check in and upload photos to facebook, but having no fear of losing the way!
strTitle: Korea 7-day SIM Card (3GB), Taiwan Shipping Only

strIntroduction: The City Tour bus, which is one of the special features in Seoul, will take you to plenty popular place in the downtown of Seou. Different from other courses, it'll bring you to some historical and traditional spots. You can learn Korea's history simply by taking the tour bus!
strTitle: Learning history by taking tour bus! Seoul City Sightseeing Bus Ticket

strIntroduction: 以壯麗的自然景觀聞名的濟州島，滋潤愛情的浪漫旅程，一同乘坐山房山郵輪，遊賞大長今拍攝地－挾才裡海岸，聯合國教科文組織地質公園指定地－山房山，以及濟州島五大火山及十大美景之一的山房窟寺等美景！
strTitle: 【浪漫首選】濟州島山房山遊覽船

strIntroduction: Door-to-Door transfer between the Gimpo International Airport and hotels in Seoul. The most convenient pick-up service ever. 24 hours a day and 7 days a week.
strTitle: (Twenty Four Seven 24/7 Shared pick-up) Gimpo International to Airport Hotel
